detaileddescription.para: Reboot AliOS.
Get HZ(ticks per second).
Get kernel version.
Create a task.

memberdef.argsstring: (aos_task_t *task, const char *name, void(*fn)(void *), void *arg, int stack_size, int prio)
memberdef.name: aos_task_new_ext

detaileddescription.para: Create a task.

parameterdescription.para: stack-buf: if stack_buf==NULL, provided by kernel.
priority value, the max is RHINO_CONFIG_USER_PRI_MAX(default 60).

detaileddescription.para: Exit a task.
Get task name.
Create a task key.
Delete a task key.
Associate a task-specific value with a key.

simplesect.para: the check status, 0 is OK, -1 indicates invalid.

detaileddescription.para: Get the value currently bound to the specified key.
Alloc a mutex.

parameterdescription.para: pointer of mutex object, mutex object must be alloced, hdl pointer in aos_mutex_t will refer a kernel obj internally.

detaileddescription.para: Free a mutex.

parameterdescription.para: mutex object, mem refered by hdl pointer in aos_mutex_t will be freed internally.

detaileddescription.para: Lock a mutex.

parameterdescription.para: mutex object, it contains kernel obj pointer which aos_mutex_new alloced.

detaileddescription.para: Unlock a mutex.

parameterdescription.para: mutex object, it contains kernel obj pointer which oc_mutex_new alloced.

detaileddescription.para: This function will check if mutex is valid.
Alloc a semaphore.

parameterdescription.para: pointer of semaphore object, semaphore object must be alloced, hdl pointer in aos_sem_t will refer a kernel obj internally.

detaileddescription.para: Destroy a semaphore.

parameterdescription.para: pointer of semaphore object, mem refered by hdl pointer in aos_sem_t will be freed internally.

detaileddescription.para: Acquire a semaphore.

parameterdescription.para: semaphore object, it contains kernel obj pointer which aos_sem_new alloced.

detaileddescription.para: Release a semaphore.

parameterdescription.para: semaphore object, it contains kernel obj pointer which aos_sem_new alloced.

detaileddescription.para: This function will check if semaphore is valid.
Release all semaphore.

parameterdescription.para: semaphore object, it contains kernel obj pointer which aos_sem_new alloced.

detaileddescription.para: This function will create an event with an initialization flag set. This function should not be called from interrupt context.
This function will free an event. This function shoud not be called from interrupt context.

parameterdescription.para: memory refered by hdl pointer in event will be freed.

memberdef.argsstring: (aos_event_t *event, unsigned int flags, unsigned char opt, unsigned int *actl_flags, unsigned int timeout)
memberdef.name: aos_event_get

detaileddescription.para: This function will try to get flag set from given event, if the request flag set is satisfied, it will return immediately, if the request flag set is not satisfied with timeout(RHINO_WAIT_FOREVER,0xFFFFFFFF), the caller task will be pended on event until the flag is satisfied, if the request flag is not satisfied with timeout(RHINO_NO_WAIT, 0x0), it will also return immediately. Note, this function should not be called from interrupt context because it has possible to lead context switch and an interrupt has no TCB to save context.

parameterdescription.para: the internal flags value hold by event.

memberdef.argsstring: (aos_event_t *event, unsigned int flags, unsigned char opt)
memberdef.name: aos_event_set

detaileddescription.para: This function will set flag set to given event, and it will check if any task which is pending on the event should be waken up.

parameterdescription.para: flag set to be set into event.

memberdef.argsstring: (aos_queue_t *queue, void *buf, unsigned int size, int max_msg)
memberdef.name: aos_queue_new

detaileddescription.para: This function will create a queue.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to the queue(the space is provided by user).
buf of the queue(provided by user).
the max size of the msg.

detaileddescription.para: This function will delete a queue.
This function will send a msg to the front of a queue.

memberdef.argsstring: (aos_queue_t *queue, unsigned int ms, void *msg, unsigned int *size)
memberdef.name: aos_queue_recv

detaileddescription.para: This function will receive msg from a queue.
This function will check if queue is valid.
This function will return buf ptr if queue is inited.

memberdef.argsstring: (aos_timer_t *timer, void(*fn)(void *, void *), void *arg, int ms, int repeat)

detaileddescription.para: This function will create a timer and run auto.

parameterdescription.para: ms of the normal timer triger.
repeat or not when the timer is created.

detaileddescription.para: This function will create a timer.

parameterdescription.para: ms of the normal timer triger.
repeat or not when the timer is created.
run auto or not when the timer is created.

detaileddescription.para: This function will delete a timer.
This function will start a timer.
This function will stop a timer.

This function will creat a workqueue.

parameterdescription.para: the call back function to run.

This function will run a work on a workqueue.
This function will run a work on the default workqueue.
This function will cancel a work on the default workqueue.
